name: Ghostly Resonance
description:
Are you able to unravel every ghost secret?

You will learn the terrible story behind the guests of a small hotel and how they died looking for the same treasure you're after.

Tips:

  • Change the frequency of your resonance pulse launcher and try to discover the correct wavelength of ghosts and several items to interact with them. Look for visual hints!
  • Ghosts change places depending on the current time, and they may have different bits of information too!

Controls:

  • Talk/use stairs: Space / gamepad X
  • Launch resonance pulse: Left Ctrl / gamepad A
  • Change pulse frequency: Keyboard Up&Down / Gamepad LB&RB
